name: Simple TicTacToe
description:
This is a simple Tic Tac Toe game. The game features a classic 3x3 grid and two players, X and O, taking turns marking their respective symbol on the board. The first player to get three in a row, either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, wins the game.

The gameplay is designed to be intuitive and easy to understand, with simple and responsive controls. Players can select a square on the grid by clicking on it with their mouse.

The visual design of the game is clean and minimalistic, with a simple color scheme and clear graphics. The game also features sound effects that enhance the player's experience and make the game more engaging.

The project is built using the Unity game engine, and the code is written in C#.
